DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOMOBILES
DOC.TEXT: Big 3 Post Strong Sales : Auto sales got_off to a fast start in the 1995 model year , Detroit ' s car_makers said , with demand for trucks driving the best sales performance in seven months . October sales of cars and light-duty trucks rose 8.9 % to 1.26 million units . Car sales rose 2.8 % to 737 # 344 vehicles , while truck sales jumped 18.8 % to 525 # 622 .
